price: Emu na wͻbεtena afe bᴐᴐ. Ɛyε Nyankopͻn bͻhyε a εyε nokorε. Ɔne Otumfoͻ no a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ no.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
